titleStmt.title: A compleate gentle-vvoman described by her feature, her person slender, her beauty admirable, her wit excellent, her carriage modest, her behaviour chast, with her constancie in love. To the tune of Sabina.
titleStmt.author: L. P. (Laurence Price), fl. 1625-1680?

notesStmt.note: In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Verse: "You muses all your aide to mee assigne ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
